title: Add fuzzy, wildcard, and proximity query syntax to payload query parsers
description:
The payload query parsers do not currently allow for special syntax such as wildcards, fuzzy search, and proximity search.  It would be useful to be able to run queries such as:  


{!payload_check f=text payloads='NOUN'}appel~1  
{!payload_check f=text payloads='NOUN'}app*  
{!payload_check f=text payloads='NOUN'}appl?  
{!payload_check f=text payloads='NOUN NOUN'}"apple core"~3
